The game was the first basketball event held at the new Intuit Dome.
The arena will host the 2026 All-Star Game and basketball for the 2028 Olympics in Los Angeles.
The Intuit Dome features advanced technology such as facial recognition for entry and a double-sided halo board.
The arena is carbon-free and cashless.
The Intuit Dome is located near other major sports and entertainment venues like Sofi Stadium and The Kia Forum.
